name: Seatus, Etherym of Return
text:
2 Level 3 "Etherym" monsters
You can target 1 of your banished "Etherym" monsters; attach it to this card as an Xyz material. You can detach 1 Xyz material from this card; return 1 card your opponent controls to their hand. (Quick Effect) You can banish 1 monster from your GY; banish this card until the next End Phase. You can only use each effect of "Seatus, Etherym or Return" once per turn.
